remarks: Deduction to prove measurability of a real function.  The third hypothesis is not necessary, but the proof of this requires countable choice, so we derive this separately as ~ ismbf3d .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)
statement:
ismbfd.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> RR ) $.
ismbfd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR* ) -> ( `' F " ( x (,) +oo ) ) e. dom vol ) $.
ismbfd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR* ) -> ( `' F " ( -oo (,) x ) ) e. dom vol ) $.
ismbfd $p |- ( ph -> F e. MblFn ) $.
$d F x $.
$d ph x $.
